Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Ummm...<sp:5:1:0> You don't have a <clr:0000>cobble crusher<clr:ffff>
or enough <clr:0000>diamonds<clr:ffff>.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand>The art of the historic <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>
is handed down through generations and
made only by chosen blacksmiths.
Creating it requires three diamonds,
a cobble crusher, and five pieces of flint.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>As much as you can listen is as much as I
can talk!
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's good and tough. Go aheadâ€”try
swinging it around!

...


<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Uh.<sp:5:1:0> When I said that, I didn't mean
RIGHT HERE. Give it a whirl outside
the city, 'K?
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>It's thanks to you that I handle this
forge now, ya know. Oh, and thanks
for the materials!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I've already mastered forging and
repairing the <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>, so you
know who to come to if it breaks on ya.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Looks like everything's accounted for.<sp:5:1:0>
All right, I'll get to making that Boulder
Breaker for ya.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Workin' from dusk till dawn. Can't I catch
a break?

Bludo can't eat <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>, so
he's taking his aggression out on me by
makin' me work all the time.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:WorkHeavy>I'll imbue it with a soul and pound it
into life!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>I can sense the spirit of the <clr:0000>Boulder
Breaker <clr:ffff>somewhere out there.

There's only one soul in all the world that
can be forged into the Boulder Breaker.

If that soul already inhabits a Boulder
Breaker, I can't make another one.
Understood?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Welcome!<sp:5:1:0> How's the Boulder Breaker
treatin' ya?

If it hadn't been for you, this forge
wouldn't have been entrusted to me.

So, please, if your Boulder Breaker
breaks, come holler at me!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Uh...<sp:5:1:0> You don't have anything ready!


I can't make it if you don't provide me
with the materials.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Sir. You already have the Boulder Breaker.


There's only one soul in all the world that
can be forged into the Boulder Breaker.

If that soul already inhabits a Boulder
Breaker, like the one you've got there,
I can't make another one. Understood?
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>No matter my skill at the forge, without
materials, those skills aren't good
for much.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welcome.<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey!<sp:5:1:0> It's you!<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0801>You're the reason this forge was left to
me, ya know. Thanks again for that!

I've already mastered forging and
repairing the Boulder Breaker, so you
know who to come to if it breaks on ya.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand>I can make it with a cobble crusher, five
pieces of flint, and three diamonds.
Near_01: I put all I had into this!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>How's the Boulder Breaker treatin' ya?
Don't hesitate to let me know if it breaks.
